name: Hockey Super Slam
description:
This is one of my "GO Train" games. It was developed almost exclusively while riding the "GO Train."

Grab 2-4 controllers and enjoy this sporting game of Hockey! (Seriously, grab controllers, the keyboard controls are not good)

Bullet points:

  • Pixels 4x bigger than 1080p pixels
  • Physics
  • Exclusively PvP, no A.I.
  • Cutscenes
  • Music
  • Sound FX
  • Animating crowds
  • A puck
  • 2v2
  • 1v1
  • Goalies
  • Players
  • Goals
  • Nets
  • Ice
  • Fully enclosed arena keeps the puck in play
